responses: Hello! How can I assist you?

Welcome! How may I help you?
Nice to see you! What do you need help with?

patterns: Tell me what you can do
responses: I can assist you with information about our products, help you with order inquiries, and answer general questions.
I'm here to provide support with your queries, just ask away!
You can ask me anything related to our products and services.
I can help you with product details, order status, and general inquiries.
I'm your virtual assistant! Just ask me anything, and I'll do my best to help.
I can assist you in navigating our store and finding the information you need.

patterns: Can you give me details about your products?
What new products do you offer?
What types of products do you sell?
What can you tell me about your inventory?
Do you have any special products?
responses: We offer a wide range of products including electronics, home goods, and apparel.
Our best-selling products include smart devices, kitchen appliances, and fitness gear.
We have a variety of new products arriving every week! Check our website for the latest.
You can find everything from gadgets to clothing in our inventory.
Our product range includes high-quality items designed to meet your needs.

patterns: What is the status of my order?
Can you give me my order status?
How can I check my order?
I want to know about my order
Can you tell me if my order is on the way?
responses: You can track your order on the 'My Orders' page.
Please provide your order number to check the status.
Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email.
Your order is currently being processed. You will be updated shortly.
If you need immediate assistance with your order, please contact support.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay with credit card?
How can I pay for my order?
Is cash on delivery an option?
Are there any fees for payment?
Can I use a gift card?
responses: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and gift cards.
You can pay using credit card, debit card, or PayPal.
Cash on delivery is available in select regions.
We offer secure payment options for your convenience.
Payment must be completed before your order is processed.

patterns: What shipping options do you offer?
Can I change my shipping address?
responses: We offer free shipping on orders over $50.
Yes, we ship internationally. Shipping fees may apply.
Shipping typically takes 3-5 business days within the U.S.
You can track your shipment using the tracking number sent to your email.
Shipping rates are calculated based on your location and order size.

patterns: How do I return a product?
What are the conditions for returns?
What if my item is defective?
How long do I have to return an item?
What is the process for returns?
responses: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase.
If you're not satisfied with your product, you can return it for a refund or exchange.
Returns are free for items that are defective or damaged.
Please contact our customer service for return instructions.
Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after receiving your returned item.

patterns: How can I contact customer support?
Can I get help with my account?
How do I report a problem?
How can I get in touch with you?
Do you have a support email?
Can I chat with a representative?
responses: Customer support is available 24/7 via chat and email.
You can reach us at support@example.com for any inquiries.
For urgent issues, please use the live chat feature on our website.
Our support team is here to help you with any questions you have.
You can find help in the 'Contact Us' section of our website.
